#summary Installation

= Introduction =

Detailed information on how to install the API.

= Details =

1) Install *ECLIPSE for RCP and RAP Developers*
Download from http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
Unpack to /eclipse

2) Install *DataNucleus 2.1.0-Release* Plugins
Download from http://sourceforge.net/projects/datanucleus/files/datanucleus-accessplatform/
Copy JARS to ECLIPSE "dropins" folder

3) Install *JDO API 3.0*
Download from http://www.datanucleus.org/downloads/maven2/javax/jdo/jdo-api/
Copy JAR to ECLIPSE "dropins" folder

4) RUN Eclipse and *create Workspace*
Suggestion: Colibri

5) Install *SVN-Subclipse Plugin*
HELP - Install New Software
http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

6) Install *BIRT Plugin*
HELP - Install New Software
Business Intelligence, Reporting and Charting

7) Install *DataNucleus Eclipse Plugin*
HELP - Install New Software
http://www.datanucleus.org/downloads/eclipse-update

8) Checkout all the projects on this repository
http://code.google.com/p/projectocolibri/
You should have NO errors (few warnings, though!)

9) Run colibri.rcp.api.example PRODUCT
This is an RCP project that uses the Colibri Plugin API
